page.title: 17Home for the Elderly
page.content:
Awel y Mor was opened in 1964 and is in an ideal situation overlooking Pentre Mawr Park. The Matron has a staff of 17 caring for 63 residents. The Home has recently purchased a mini bus from funds raised by Friends of the Home. Regular visitors to the home is the hairdresser, chiropodist, mobile library etc. The residents are made to feel part of the community and are regularly entertained by schools and societies.
There are various Private Homes catering for the elderly in Abergele eg Bryn Aber, Tan y Bryn (physically handicapped) etc. There is a predominance of retired and elderly people living in Abergele and this is an upward trend. There are more and more applications for converting large properties into Homes for the elderly.
